Name: Human Madness
About the game: Human Madness is a multiplayer shooter game Features: - weapon customization: for now the game contain 11 weapons, but we working to add more soon - character set customization: there is different variety of cloth - Weapon System: you can shoot behind walls , the bullet damage will reduced depend on the material of the wall - AI system: 8*8 Bot - Game mode: you can Choose from two factions (police and rioters ) and play in team death match
Meta Title: Human Madness: Oct 21, 2021, The One and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Human Madness? Check out the release date (Oct 21, 2021), developer insights from The One, and a complete game summary.
